generated_doNotEdit.title: Move To Random Block Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows mob to move towards a random block.

fields.title: Block Distance
fields.description: Defines the distance from the mob, in blocks, that the block to move to will be chosen.

fields.title: Within Radius
fields.description: Defines the distance in blocks the mob has to be from the block for the movement to be finished.

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
